verses.text_plain: And David made him houses in the city of David, and prepared a place for the ark of God, and pitched for it a tent.
verses.verse_html: 1And David made him houses in the city of David, and prepared a place for the ark of God, and pitched for it a tent.

verses.text_plain: Then David said, None ought to carry the ark of God but the Levites: for them hath the Lord chosen to carry the ark of God, and to minister unto him for ever.
verses.verse_html:
2Then David said, None ought to carry the ark of God but the Levites: for them hath the Lord chosen to carry the ark of God, and to minister unto him for ever. ▼
▼ None…: Heb. It is not to carry the ark of God, but for the Levites

footnotes.body_text: ▼ None…: Heb. It is not to carry the ark of God, but for the Levites
footnotes.body_html: ▼ None…: Heb. It is not to carry the ark of God, but for the Levites

verses.text_plain: And David gathered all Israel together to Jerusalem, to bring up the ark of the Lord unto his place, which he had prepared for it.
verses.verse_html: 3And David gathered all Israel together to Jerusalem, to bring up the ark of the Lord unto his place, which he had prepared for it.

verses.text_plain: And David assembled the children of Aaron, and the Levites:
verses.verse_html: 4And David assembled the children of Aaron, and the Levites:

verses.text_plain: Of the sons of Kohath; Uriel the chief, and his brethren an hundred and twenty:
verses.verse_html:
5Of the sons of Kohath; Uriel the chief, and his brethren an hundred and twenty: ▼
▼ brethren: or, kinsmen

verses.text_plain: Of the sons of Merari; Asaiah the chief, and his brethren two hundred and twenty:
verses.verse_html: 6Of the sons of Merari; Asaiah the chief, and his brethren two hundred and twenty:

verses.text_plain: Of the sons of Gershom; Joel the chief, and his brethren an hundred and thirty:
verses.verse_html: 7Of the sons of Gershom; Joel the chief, and his brethren an hundred and thirty:

verses.text_plain: Of the sons of Elizaphan; Shemaiah the chief, and his brethren two hundred:
verses.verse_html: 8Of the sons of Elizaphan; Shemaiah the chief, and his brethren two hundred:

verses.text_plain: Of the sons of Hebron; Eliel the chief, and his brethren fourscore:
verses.verse_html: 9Of the sons of Hebron; Eliel the chief, and his brethren fourscore:

verses.text_plain: Of the sons of Uzziel; Amminadab the chief, and his brethren an hundred and twelve.
verses.verse_html: 10Of the sons of Uzziel; Amminadab the chief, and his brethren an hundred and twelve.

verses.text_plain: And David called for Zadok and Abiathar the priests, and for the Levites, for Uriel, Asaiah, and Joel, Shemaiah, and Eliel, and Amminadab,
verses.verse_html: 11And David called for Zadok and Abiathar the priests, and for the Levites, for Uriel, Asaiah, and Joel, Shemaiah, and Eliel, and Amminadab,

verses.text_plain: And said unto them, Ye are the chief of the fathers of the Levites: sanctify yourselves, both ye and your brethren, that ye may bring up the ark of the Lord God of Israel unto the place that I have prepared for it.
verses.verse_html: 12And said unto them, Ye are the chief of the fathers of the Levites: sanctify yourselves, both ye and your brethren, that ye may bring up the ark of the Lord God of Israel unto the place that I have prepared for it.

verses.text_plain: For because ye did it not at the first, the Lord our God made a breach upon us, for that we sought him not after the due order.
verses.verse_html: 13For because ye did it not at the first, the Lord our God made a breach upon us, for that we sought him not after the due order.

tokens.text: upon us, for that we sought
him not after the due order

verses.text_plain: So the priests and the Levites sanctified themselves to bring up the ark of the Lord God of Israel.
verses.verse_html: 14So the priests and the Levites sanctified themselves to bring up the ark of the Lord God of Israel.

verses.text_plain: And the children of the Levites bare the ark of God upon their shoulders with the staves thereon, as Moses commanded according to the word of the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 15And the children of the Levites bare the ark of God upon their shoulders with the staves thereon, as Moses commanded according to the word of the Lord.

verses.text_plain: And David spake to the chief of the Levites to appoint their brethren to be the singers with instruments of musick, psalteries and harps and cymbals, sounding, by lifting up the voice with joy.
verses.verse_html: 16And David spake to the chief of the Levites to appoint their brethren to be the singers with instruments of musick, psalteries and harps and cymbals, sounding, by lifting up the voice with joy.

verses.text_plain: So the Levites appointed Heman the son of Joel; and of his brethren, Asaph the son of Berechiah; and of the sons of Merari their brethren, Ethan the son of Kushaiah;
verses.verse_html: 17So the Levites appointed Heman the son of Joel; and of his brethren, Asaph the son of Berechiah; and of the sons of Merari their brethren, Ethan the son of Kushaiah;

verses.text_plain: And with them their brethren of the second degree, Zechariah, Ben, and Jaaziel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Unni, Eliab, and Benaiah, and Maaseiah, and Mattithiah, and Elipheleh, and Mikneiah, and Obed–edom, and Jeiel, the porters.
verses.verse_html: 18And with them their brethren of the second degree, Zechariah, Ben, and Jaaziel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Unni, Eliab, and Benaiah, and Maaseiah, and Mattithiah, and Elipheleh, and Mikneiah, and Obed–edom, and Jeiel, the porters.

verses.text_plain: So the singers, Heman, Asaph, and Ethan, were appointed to sound with cymbals of brass;
verses.verse_html: 19So the singers, Heman, Asaph, and Ethan, were appointed to sound with cymbals of brass;

verses.text_plain: And Zechariah, and Aziel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Unni, and Eliab, and Maaseiah, and Benaiah, with psalteries on Alamoth;
verses.verse_html: 20And Zechariah, and Aziel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Unni, and Eliab, and Maaseiah, and Benaiah, with psalteries on Alamoth;

verses.text_plain: And Mattithiah, and Elipheleh, and Mikneiah, and Obed–edom, and Jeiel, and Azaziah, with harps on the Sheminith to excel.
verses.verse_html:
21And Mattithiah, and Elipheleh, and Mikneiah, and Obed–edom, and Jeiel, and Azaziah, with harps on the Sheminith to excel. ▼
▼ on the…: or, on the eighth to oversee

footnotes.body_text: ▼ on the…: or, on the eighth to oversee
footnotes.body_html: ▼ on the…: or, on the eighth to oversee

verses.text_plain: And Chenaniah, chief of the Levites, was for song: he instructed about the song, because he was skilful.
verses.verse_html:
22And Chenaniah, chief of the Levites, was for song: he instructed about the song, because he was skilful. ▼
▼ was for…: or, was for the carriage: he instructed about the carriage
 , ▼
▼ song: Heb. lifting up

footnotes.body_text: ▼ was for…: or, was for the carriage: he instructed about the carriage
footnotes.body_html: ▼ was for…: or, was for the carriage: he instructed about the carriage
▼ song: Heb. lifting up

verses.text_plain: And Berechiah and Elkanah were doorkeepers for the ark.
verses.verse_html: 23And Berechiah and Elkanah were doorkeepers for the ark.

verses.text_plain: And Shebaniah, and Jehoshaphat, and Nethaneel, and Amasai, and Zechariah, and Benaiah, and Eliezer, the priests, did blow with the trumpets before the ark of God: and Obed–edom and Jehiah were doorkeepers for the ark.
verses.verse_html: 24And Shebaniah, and Jehoshaphat, and Nethaneel, and Amasai, and Zechariah, and Benaiah, and Eliezer, the priests, did blow with the trumpets before the ark of God: and Obed–edom and Jehiah were doorkeepers for the ark.

verses.text_plain: So David, and the elders of Israel, and the captains over thousands, went to bring up the ark of the covenant of the Lord out of the house of Obed–edom with joy.
verses.verse_html: 25So David, and the elders of Israel, and the captains over thousands, went to bring up the ark of the covenant of the Lord out of the house of Obed–edom with joy.

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass, when God helped the Levites that bare the ark of the covenant of the Lord, that they offered seven bullocks and seven rams.
verses.verse_html: 26And it came to pass, when God helped the Levites that bare the ark of the covenant of the Lord, that they offered seven bullocks and seven rams.

tokens.text: And it came to pass, when God

verses.text_plain: And David was clothed with a robe of fine linen, and all the Levites that bare the ark, and the singers, and Chenaniah the master of the song with the singers: David also had upon him an ephod of linen.
verses.verse_html:
27And David was clothed with a robe of fine linen, and all the Levites that bare the ark, and the singers, and Chenaniah the master of the song with the singers: David also had upon him an ephod of linen. ▼
▼ song: or, carriage

verses.text_plain: Thus all Israel brought up the ark of the covenant of the Lord with shouting, and with sound of the cornet, and with trumpets, and with cymbals, making a noise with psalteries and harps.
verses.verse_html: 28Thus all Israel brought up the ark of the covenant of the Lord with shouting, and with sound of the cornet, and with trumpets, and with cymbals, making a noise with psalteries and harps.

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass, as the ark of the covenant of the Lord came to the city of David, that Michal the daughter of Saul looking out at a window saw king David dancing and playing: and she despised him in her heart.
verses.verse_html: 29And it came to pass, as the ark of the covenant of the Lord came to the city of David, that Michal the daughter of Saul looking out at a window saw king David dancing and playing: and she despised him in her heart.
